actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution recognizing the right of self-determination of the Irish people and urging the prompt removal of British troops from Northern Ireland.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Irish people be permitted to exercise the right of national self-determination. Calls upon the United Kingdom to set a date for the withdrawal of all her troops from Northern Ireland.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution recognizing the right of self-determination of the Irish people and urging the prompt removal of British troops from Northern Ireland.
